text: hi I'm Dave Brown customers are bringing
a wide variety of applications to AWS
each with the need to be highly
available highly scalable secure and
service a global customer base so over
the years we've been rolling at a global
network that links all of our regions
together to provide customers with a
global backbone that effectively
delivers application content to their
customers there's never a day where
we're not thinking about what is the
next thing that we need to be doing the
performance of our network all the
features that we provide to customers or
parts of the stack today that we could
think about what is the next evolution
from a scale and availability point of
view it's just continuous innovation and
pioneering the security is our number
one priority and providing customers
with a highly secure network and
ensuring that their applications as well
as their customers data is secure is
vitally important for the success of our
business the design of EPC has deeply
thought about security right from day
one to make sure that all network
traffic within of EPC is completely
private we provide customers with a
99.95 availability SLA for ec2 today
achieving that SLA requires a lot of
deep thinking on the network inside we
have several layers of redundancy all
the way throughout the network to ensure
that no single router failure could
impact your availability in the unlikely
event that we do have a problem we have
a large team of engineers that are
available to dig into the problem
immediately very often working directly
with the customer and their engineers to
ensure that we get to the root cause and
resolve what we have been impacting
their application performance the
network is also critically important for
customers applications over the years
we've continued to innovate on network
performance through the innovation of
our nitrous system which allows all
network processing to be offloaded to a
dedicated processor on our underlying
ec2 server this guarantees levels of
performance latency and jitter that are
not achievable without this technology
we've learned a lot over the last 10
years in building highly available
systems that really scale the globe one
of the key differentiators that we've
done within AWS is providing strong
isolation between our AWS regions that
approach of strong isolation
be taken all the way from my
availability zones through to our
regions and really provides customers
with a cloud infrastructure that they
can rely on
I've enjoyed sharing a few ELLs about
the Amazon Network with you and excited
about what we're going to be doing in
